trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AssemblyLoadEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.AssemblyLoadEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.AppDomain.AssemblyLoad" /> event of an <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa el método que controlará el evento <see cref="E:System.AppDomain.AssemblyLoad" /> de un <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" />.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.AssemblyLoadEventHandler> is used to specify the methods that are invoked in response to an <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyLoad> event.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.AssemblyLoadEventHandler> se utiliza para especificar los métodos que se invocan en respuesta a un <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyLoad> eventos.

trans-unit.source: To associate an instance of <xref:System.AssemblyLoadEventHandler> with an event, add the instance to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para asociar una instancia de <xref:System.AssemblyLoadEventHandler> con un evento, debe agregar la instancia al evento.

trans-unit.source: The methods referenced by the <xref:System.AssemblyLoadEventHandler> are invoked whenever an assembly is loaded, until the <xref:System.AssemblyLoadEventHandler> is removed from the event.
trans-unit.target: Los métodos que se hace referencia a la <xref:System.AssemblyLoadEventHandler> se invoca cuando un ensamblado se carga, hasta que el <xref:System.AssemblyLoadEventHandler> se quita del evento.
